==Trivia==
* ''[[No Turning Back]]'' is a remix of this soundtrack and is used for the [[Coral Defenders]] challenge in [[Enkanomiya]]. The additional arrangements were done by Yijun Jiang ({{zh|姜以君}}) of [[HOYO-MiX]].
